Hospital.Treatments

Class Treatment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hospital.Treatments.Treatment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NeedsItems, Result, Appointable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cast, Medication, Surgery

    public abstract class Treatment
extends java.lang.Object
implements Result, Appointable, NeedsItems
    Provides common functionality and an interface for the different kinds of treatment provided in the hospital.
